time. The current version of this OS has drawn criticism for its lack of multitasking. Joe Fiore, the head of the Windows Phone 7 team, joined Steve Ballmer on stage at the MWC and said, When apps run in the background, you risk draining your battery. Our implementation provides a battery-safe solution for third-party multitasking. In a demo, Fiore showed how this will work: pressing and holding on the smartphone's Back button will bring up a list of currently running software. More Changes Are Coming Fiore

at Mr. Colin Powell 's contention that he was misled by faulty intelligence into making the public case for the invasion of Iraq. '' Colin Powell was not duped or misled by anybody,'' Mr. Donald Rumsfeld writes. Nor did he lie about Saddam Hussein 's suspected WMD stockpiles. The president did not lie. The vice president did not lie.[ CIA Director President Bush ] Tenet did not lie. Condoleezza Rice did not lie. I did not lie.... The far less dramatic truth is that we were wrong. Even so, Mr. Donald Rumsfeld -- who does reveal that former President Bush asked for Iraq invasion plans within days of 9/11-- argues that removing Saddam Hussein was the right thing to do. Among the candidates Mike Pence helped was Jackie Walorski , a tea party favorite who narrowly lost her race against Democratic Rep. Joe Donnelly in northern Indiana. Jackie Walorski said Mike Pence can appeal to both social and economic conservatives. I know he feels pulled because there is a great campaign to recruit him at the federal level, she said. ''I'm going to be excited whatever door he picks.'' If Mike Pence does decide to run for president, he'll likely have to start working quickly to raise campaign money.

Nokia's support will help Windows Phone overall to build strength versus other mobile platforms, Steve Ballmer said. ''That's not just good for Nokia, that's good for all our handset partners.''
